extendedInfo.description: Looking for a hotel, a B&B or a lodging in Singapore? Search no more! This application has all the information you need: * You can use it if you are in a car, on a bicycle or walking * You can view all objectives on the map * You can search objectives * You can view objectives near you * You can view directions (visual route, distance and duration) * You can use it with Street View * You can use it with NavigationObjectives: * Hotels * Bed & Breakfast * Lodging * and more!Keywords: singapore, hotels, street view, navigation, bed and breakfast, lodging

reviews.title: Looks like ok but incomplete
reviews.comment: Hotels are not listed completely.  Where are Marina Oriental, MBS, Park Regis, Hotel Michael, Capella, Rasa Sentosa etc. Many are missed out.
reviews.author: Eddie Luen
